hero.title: PARIS 2025
hero.subtitle: BUILDING MISSIONARY BRIDGES
hero.description: Join us for the most anticipated global conference bringing together thought leaders, innovators and changemakers in the heart of Paris.

about.title: About Paris 2025 – Building Missionary Bridges
about.para1: Paris 2025 is a global gathering of church leaders, missionaries, and visionaries committed to advancing the Kingdom of God in our generation. Set in the heart of Paris, this four-day conference will explore urgent themes shaping today's global mission landscape—reaching the unreached, evangelizing Israel and the Muslim world, and discipling the nations for lasting transformation.
about.para2: With powerful keynote sessions, dynamic workshops, and meaningful networking opportunities, BUILDING MISSIONARY BRIDGES is more than a conference—it's a call to unity, collaboration, and bold action.
about.para3: Bringing together some of the most strategic voices from every continent, Paris 2025 is a catalytic space to exchange ideas, discern spiritual trends, and chart the course for the Church's role in global reformation.
about.para4: Whether you're a seasoned leader, an emerging missionary, or simply passionate about God's mission to the nations, Paris 2025 will challenge, equip, and inspire you for greater impact.

venue.title: Venue Information
venue.description: PARIS 2025 will take place at the Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour, a beautiful venue in Boulogne-Billancourt, just outside Paris.

transport.cdg: From Charles de Gaulle Airport: 45 minutes by taxi or Air France shuttle
transport.orly: From Orly Airport: 30 minutes by taxi
